Package ru.nsu.kataeva

Class Deck

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.kataeva.Deck
public class Deck extends Object
Represents a deck of playing cards and handles deck operations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Deck()
    Creates a standard 52-card deck for game and shuffles it.
    Deck(boolean ignoredForTesting)
    Creates an empty deck for testing.
